issue.subject: False button displayed for requests "done" in edit mode
issue.description:
When opening a request (view=request&layout=edit) that is already completed, there are two buttons at the bottom :

- "Send to the user"
- "Cancel"

Only one single button should be displayed with the text "Back".

journals.notes: Will be fixed by Enhancement #979 (We'll not be able to respond to all product at one, we'll have one post per product/diffusion)
